Comments
September 1, 2022
Yelak
Not trying to argue that this is a great figure, but he does have a stop click. So you can’t just one punch him. And that stop click with 19 defend would be great mid game, plus the chance to FREE support.
August 20, 2022
Nightwing-fan
This guy is huge, nearly 2 1/4" tall. The sculpt looks great and remines me of a AEW/WWE wrestler who just showed up to fight his opponent. He looks like he already has a championship belt on. Now if this was the case then he would fit in perfectly. But alas it's not. I know this is when he went back to farming, but that dial is a creampuff. Where did they come up with the idea of only 4 clixs of life? Granted, starting with a 18D going up to 19D is very nice. But with most of this set I've seen starting with a 11 or 12 attack. With two dice you basically have a 50% chance of rolling a 6 or 7 to hit him, if not outright KO him. Give someone outwit and 4 damage and Colossus is a one-hit has-been. He reminds me of figures from the Joker or Harleys set when Wizkids decided to do Power Creep is reverse. He is just a shell of a character who has a glass jaw. Great piece if you're displaying him, but one I would pass on when building a team unless your opponent's best attract is a 9 or 10.
